div.h4: PROPOSAL FOR THE PROVISION OF SECURITY SERVICES -

div.p: Thank you for giving us this opportunity to introduce our company portfolio to your establishment.

Our unrivalled experience, industry-leading expertise and ability to deliver highly innovative and effective services have made William Secure Solutions a trusted partner for our private and business clients.

The William Secure Solutions team puts service at the heart of our operation. Our commitment to delivering consistently high standards is what drives us as a business. Our unique approach sees the time-honoured human elements of security – diligence, motivation and training – met with cutting-edge technology to provide perfectly tailored solutions to each client. This is not a one-size- fits-all; this is best-in-class, fit-for-purpose security that delivers total peace of mind. Below is an overview of our company profile.

Established in 1999 as William Security Services, the company has grown from strength to strengthand built a reputation for excellence in our field. In 2016, based on the foundations of the previous 17 years and under the same highly experienced management and operation steam, we unveiled our new brand - William Secure Solutions - as part of our new vision forgrowth and service enhancement.

As William Security, we were graded ‘A’, ‘A’, ‘B’ by the Singapore Police Force in 2015, 2014 and 2013 respectively. This was a testament to our commitment to providing quality services and enhancing our solutions in-line with the latest security trends.

As William Secure Solutions,we are graded ‘B’ by the Singapore Police Force in 2019,we have also preserved the same people-centric, innovative and technologically-advanced ethos. We are trusted by our clients and have been accreditedto thehighest levels by the Singapore Government. We are an ISO 9001:2008 and OHSAS18001:2007 organisation as well as a bizSafe Enterprise. We are also a member of the Security Association (Singapore) and Association of Certified Security Agencies.

div.p: Thereafter, to ensure that the quality of our services is maintained, we will visit the site at least twice per week to meet up with our officers.
We have a performance appraisal system in place, where we will review the performance of each officer three times a year and provide counselling, if necessary.

Continuous training will be provided forour team of officers. Security Officers will be scheduled for in-house training to ensure that they are kept abreast on the fast-changing security landscape as part of their personal development program. Senior Officers will also be sent for courses conducted by approved institutions.
An Operations Executive will be assigned to manage your account and will also be on stand-by 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, to attend to your feedback and major incidences at your premises.

div.p: The rates quoted are based on the positions which you have requested for. Please note that the job functions of the respective position are confined within the guidelines prescribed by the Progressive Wage Model framework.

Hence, the engaged personnel areonly able to carry out duties according to their appointed positions as indicated in the framework (e.g. A Security Officer cannot perform the duties and job functions of a Senior Security Officer or Security Supervisor). A copy of the job functions for each position is enclosed at Annex A for your reference.

Kindly note that the prices quoted herein are only valid for 1 monthbarring any revision or changes to Government Policies related to the security industry. A lead time of 1 month is also required to assume operations.
